name: SIREGHAPE
description:
SO THIS IS THE 2nd HORROR GAME I AM SO THIS A GAME ABOUT SIREN HEAD SO YOU MUST POTO SIREN HEAD UNTIL HE IS GETTING UP

ON ONE DAY A PERSON NAME RELSONSES A MYSTERIOUS FRIEND THAT HAS TO BE MYSTERIOUSLY RELSON AND SOME OF HIS FRIENDS GO TO THE FOREST WHERE HIS FRIENDS RELSON CREATES AND RELSON MUST BE PHOTOS OF SIREN HEAD.
